channel.title: Making Jad only 1 wave. [317]
channel.description: Ok, lol my fight cave mini game is 63 waves lol nobody wants to do that, could I just go to my client.java and delete all the waves except the one for jad and it still work?? or do I have to do something else??

item.title: Making Jad only 1 wave. [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Dude, thank you sooo freakin much!! now jad is only 1 wave!! I would definently rep++++ if i could

Read full topic

item.title: Making Jad only 1 wave. [317]
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

Easiest thing to do would be search this: public void getWavekillCount()

and replace that whole method with this:

public void getWavekillCount() { if(TzWave != -1) if(TzWave == 1) KilledTz = 0; }

So your entire Jad/TzWave method should look like this:

[code] public void getWavekillCount()
{
if(TzWave != -1)
if(TzWave == 1)
KilledTz = 0;
}

public void SpawnNewWave()
{
    if(TzWave == 1)
    {
        talk("Look out, here comes TzTok-Jad!", 2617);
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 2400, 5083, heightLevel); //Level 702, Proudly recoded by Reality.
        NeededKills = 1;
    } 
}
public void healJad()
{
    for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)
        if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null)
        {
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].heightLevel == heightLevel)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP < server.npcHandler.npcs[i].MaxHP)
	{
            server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP += 10;
	}
        }
}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Making Jad only 1 wave. [317]
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

Okay open up your client.java and search for

        if(TzWave == 1)

You should then see a long method from wave 1 to wave 63. Delete that whole method and replace it with this

if(TzWave == 1) { talk("Look out, here comes TzTok-Jad!", 2617); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 2400, 5083, heightLevel); //Level 702, Proudly recoded by Reality. NeededKills = 1; } }

Now you have only 1 wave =)

Read full topic
